biotools.summary: PDBselect is a list of representative protein chains with low mutual sequence identity selected from the protein data bank (PDB) to enable unbiased statistics. PDBfilter-select is an online service to generate user-defined selections.

bioschemas.name: PDBselect
bioschemas.summary: PDBselect is a list of representative protein chains with low mutual sequence identity selected from the protein data bank (PDB) to enable unbiased statistics. PDBfilter-select is an online service to generate user-defined selections.
